page.name: Rock Climbing Club
page.description: We are a club of amateur rock climbers who love to get together and climb. Climbing is primarily an individual sport: you're goal is to improve your own technique, strength, and mind. But, when you climb with others, it becomes a really great communal sport. We aim to be a supportive club for both beginners and those wanting to get really good at climbing. At the base of it, all we want to do is have fun and climb stuff. All our welcome!
